import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from './../../service/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent { listCart:any[]=[] constructor( private DataService: DataService) { } ngOnInit() { } load_Cart(){ this.DataService.get("/cart").then((req:any)=>{ this.listCart=req; }) } }
